Americans.

translation.en: Come with us!
All right, come on!
-Come on, baby! -[screams]
[over PA] And now it's time!
The moment you've all been waiting for.
The groom, Vikram Govindan!
This is crazy!
Brother!
Back! Get everybody back! Get everybody back!
[guard] Stay back!
Vik!
-[Nick] Okay, all right. -[Claudette shrieks]
[Claudette] Is he dead?
It's not him. It's not Vik.
translation.es: No es él. No es Vik.

translation.en: Oh, thank God! It's only Mr. Lou.
-Who did this to you? -[Claudette] Where is Vik? Hey!
translation.es: - ¿Quién le hizo esto? - ¿Y Vik? ¿Quién fue? ¿Qué? ¡Santo cielo!

translation.en: [Audrey] Who? What? Oh my gosh!
Where is Vik?
-Who did this to you? -Who was it? Do you remember?
It was…
[Nick] Say it. Say it. Don't die. Don't die!
-[Audrey] Oh my gosh! -[Claudette] Where is Vik?
[guard 1] Clear! Clear! Come on!
-Come on! Come on! Come on! Go! -[guard 2] Clear!
-[Nick] This is a distraction. -[Audrey] From what?
translation.es: Es una distracción. - ¿De qué? - ¡De la fuga!

translation.en: From the escape!
-[Colonel] Are you serious? -[shutter clicks] What do you mean all communication systems are down?
translation.es: ¿En serio? ¿Cómo que se cayó el sistema de comunicación?

translation.en: Get them up and running!
We have a security officer compromised. We need medical attention immediately.
translation.es: Hay un agente herido. Necesitamos asistencia médica.

translation.en: [sighs] Okay.
[Vik] Help!
Yo, you hatin’ hard on me right now, son!
-Homeboy! -[Vik] Nick!
[Vik yelling] Nick!
This is some janky-ass shit!
[Colonel] Lock down the island until the security cameras are back online.
translation.es: Cierren la isla hasta que las cámaras de seguridad vuelvan a funcionar.

translation.en: All guests are to remain in their rooms.
translation.es: Que nadie salga de su habitación.

translation.en: Oh my God. We need to get ahead of this, or our shares will plummet.
translation.es: Hay que resolver esto, o nuestras acciones se desplomarán.

translation.en: My brother could be dead and the only thing you're concerned about are share prices?
translation.es: Mi hermano podría estar muerto, ¿y te preocupan las acciones?

translation.en: How do you think our investors will react when news of this gets out,
you little Miss Minority Shareholder?
Giving all her money to save the whales and heal the planet
translation.es: La que vive regalando dinero a las ballenas, la ecología

translation.en: and all that nonsense.
Colonel. Where is Vik?
Where is my husband?
[Colonel] We will find him. We will find him.
The Maharajah's been kidnapped.
-What? -[Countess] Oh my God!
-Where did they take him? -[Nick] He's alive.
Somebody with a machine gun threw him on a boat, and they took off.
translation.es: Alguien con una ametralladora se lo llevó en una lancha.

translation.en: -How many kidnappers? -[Nick] One.
Which means his partner is still here on the island.
translation.es: Por lo que su cómplice sigue en la isla.

translation.en: Hold on. How do you know there were two?
If the kidnapper had Vik and was taking him to the boat…
translation.es: Si el secuestrador tenía a Vik y lo llevaba a la lancha…

translation.en: Ah, someone else was leading the elephant into the tent.
translation.es: alguien más trajo al elefante a la tienda.

translation.en: -Thank you. -There are 400 people on this island.
translation.es: - Gracias. - Hay 400 personas en la isla.

translation.en: That's a lot of suspects.
Let us narrow it down for you, okay, Colonel?
translation.es: Vamos a reducir la lista, coronel.

translation.en: Claudette, how many people knew about the elephant being part of the ceremony?
translation.es: Claudette, ¿cuánta gente sabía que traerían un elefante?

translation.en: Just the board.
Yeah, we had to sign off at the expense of transporting an elephant.
translation.es: Tuvimos que autorizar el gasto del traslado.

translation.en: So that means all of you.
What are you implying?
I think it's very obvious what I'm implying.
translation.es: Creo que lo que digo es bastante obvio.

translation.en: -[Nick] Mm-hmm. -One of you is an accomplice to a murder.
translation.es: Uno de ustedes es cómplice de un asesinato.

translation.en: -That is ridiculous! -I'm not on the board!
Is it? You all hated my brother!
What? No, I… I love Vik.
[scoffs] Oh, please!
-You've never forgiven me. -For what?
-Breaking up your engagement. -Oh, get over yourself.
translation.es: - Romper tu compromiso. - Baja esos humos.

translation.en: It was an arranged marriage between our families.
translation.es: Nuestras familias habían arreglado el matrimonio.

translation.en: We amicably split in order to allow for your so-called "love marriage."
translation.es: Nos separamos amigablemente para permitir su "matrimonio por amor".

translation.en: You didn't want this marriage to go through so you kidnapped him!
translation.es: No querías que se casara y lo secuestraste.

translation.en: You gold-digging--
-Ladies, stop it! -Calm down, everybody!
translation.es: - Trepadora… - Señoritas, ¡ya basta! ¡Cálmese todo el mundo!

translation.en: -We do this for a living. It's what we do. -[Nick] It's our thing.
translation.es: - Este es nuestro trabajo. - Es lo nuestro.

translation.en: -And this is not just another case. -No.
translation.es: - No es un caso más. - No.

translation.en: -[Nick] This is personal. -[Audrey] Yeah, it's Vik.
translation.es: - Esto es personal. - Sí, es Vik.

translation.en: -[Nick] He means a lot to us. -[Audrey] So we'll find out who did this.
translation.es: - Lo queremos mucho. - Encontraremos al culpable.

translation.en: -[Nick] A hundred percent. -[Audrey] And find out why they did this.
translation.es: - Eso. - Averiguaremos por qué lo hizo. Sí.

translation.en: And we're gonna get Vik back, okay?
We're gonna do this for the low, low price of $25 million.
translation.es: Y lo haremos por la bagatela de 25 millones de dólares.

translation.en: Twenty-five mil, honey. I swear to God.
[Nick] I would've settled for ten grand.
So insane.
What are you doing?
[Nick] I'm blocking the door so no one can get in.
translation.es: ¿Qué crees? Es para que no entren.

translation.en: [Audrey] Honey, you're gonna hurt your back.
translation.es: Te vas a lastimar la espalda.

translation.en: You know what would hurt my back? A knife going through it.
translation.es: No, que me claven un cuchillo me la lastimaría.

translation.en: The killer knows we're on to him.
translation.es: El asesino sabe que lo buscamos.

translation.en: We're on the next-to-kill list. I guarantee it.
What happened to Vik? A guy that rich gets kidnapped for the money.
translation.es: - ¿Qué le pasó a Vik? - Lo secuestraron por el dinero.

translation.en: There's no profit in hurting him.
Oh God. We're not gonna be invited anywhere ever again. Ever again.
translation.es: Dios mío. No volverán a invitarnos a ningún lado.

translation.en: The cheese has a hold on me, honey. I can't stop.
translation.es: El queso es tremendo, no puedo parar.

translation.en: Are you just… Will you take a slice like a civilized person?
translation.es: ¿Estás comiendo…? Sé civilizado, córtate una porción.

translation.en: I don't know where the knife is.
translation.es: - No sé dónde está el cuchillo. - Dios.

translation.en: -Oh Jesus! -[Nick] What? You got a headache?
translation.es: - No sé dónde está el cuchillo. - Dios. ¿Te duele la cabeza?

translation.en: -Yes! -[Nick] I'm sorry.
-How's your back? -My back's killing me.
-I'll get Advil. -Please. Please.
-I'm gonna get more cheese in me. -Honey, do not eat all that cheese.
translation.es: - Voy a comer más queso. - No te lo comas todo.

translation.en: That affects… You're terrible all night.
translation.es: Te hace mal, pasas mal la noche.

translation.en: -Absolutely. -Oh.
And I have pictures from the tent of a burned robe with bloodstains.
translation.es: En la tienda tomé fotos de una túnica quemada con manchas de sangre.

translation.en: Someone was trying to get rid of the evidence, and I'm sure it was the elephant handler.
translation.es: Quisieron eliminar pruebas, seguro que fue el cuidador del elefante.

translation.en: Good detecting, sweetheart.
-I'm doing my best. Here. -[Nick] Okay. Thank you.
translation.es: - Hago lo que puedo, toma. - Gracias.

translation.en: -[Audrey] One, two, three, four. -[Nick] Okay.
[Nick] I gotta move this stuff now?
What if that's the killer?
-Killers don't knock. -What if it's housekeeping?
translation.es: - Los asesinos no tocan. - ¿Y si es la limpieza?

translation.en: We… We're good! We don't need any towels.
No! No! We do need towels. Leave 'em out front, please!
translation.es: No, sí necesitamos. Déjelas en la puerta.

translation.en: We've been here ten minutes. You need more towels?
You use 30 towels after every shower.
I'm sorry. At least I shower.
All right, you got me there.
[Francisco] It's me, Francisco!
Francisco?
Wait, wait, wait. What if he's the killer?
The only thing he wants to murder is your hm-hm!
translation.es: ¡Lo único que quiere matar es a tu…!

translation.en: Hey!
-[Francisco] Hurry! There's no time! -[Nick] Be right there!
-[Audrey] We're hurrying! -[Nick] We know!
So sorry.
-[Nick] Hey. -Hey.
-You. -[Nick] Mm-hmm.
Gorgeous.
[Nick] Jesus Christ. All right.
[Audrey] Put this back. You said hurry.
What's… How can we help?
-I have information. -[Nick] Yes.
Everyone thinks Claudette is this gold digger, but what's not so well known is the fact that, as a precaution,
translation.es: Dicen que Claudette es una cazafortunas, pero nadie sabe que, por precaución,

translation.en: the board made her sign a brutal prenup.
translation.es: el directorio la obligó a firmar un contrato prenupcial brutal.

translation.en: So that means if Vik divorces her, she's left with nothin'.
translation.es: Entonces, si Vik se divorcia de ella, no le queda nada.

translation.en: -I gotta move this shit again? -Wait. Wait. Who is it?
[Claudette] It's Claudette. You must hear what I have to say.
Okay, one second. Let's get you in the closet.
translation.es: Danos un segundo. Métete en el armario.

translation.en: [Nick] Okay, be right there. I gotta get some cheese.
translation.es: Ya voy, necesito un poco de queso.

translation.en: -Okay. Just go in there. -[rock scraping floor]
No! Get off of… Jesus!
-Coming, Claudette! -Sorry! One second.
[Nick] Hurry!
-[Audrey] Hello, Claudette. -[Nick] Hi.
[Claudette] They all think I'm marrying Vik just for the money, especially the Countess.
translation.es: Todos creen que me caso por el dinero. Sobre todo, la condesa.

translation.en: She's been jealous of me ever since we met.
-Really? I can imagine why. -I can imagine.
But still, she was my best friend.
-Right. -[Nick] Sure.
-You know? -Yeah.
-We were so close. -[Audrey] Oh!
And I think I just miss her sometimes.
translation.es: Creo que, a veces, la extraño.

translation.en: -Oh, sorry. -[Claudette sobbing]
-I just wanna know who kidnapped my Vik. -Mm-hmm.
translation.es: Solo quiero saber quién secuestró a mi Vik.

translation.en: They all have something to gain from this.
-Terrible. -[Claudette] I can't trust any of them!
translation.es: - Terrible. - No puedo confiar en nadie.

translation.en: -[whispers] There's a gun. -A gun?
[Claudette] The Colonel, so bitter about his demotion. Saira, always starved for attention.
translation.es: El coronel, enojado por perder su cargo. Saira, siempre queriendo atención.

translation.en: And Vik had just discovered Francisco's dark secret.
translation.es: Y Vik acababa de descubrir el secreto oscuro de Francisco.

translation.en: -[Audrey] What? -[Nick] He had a secret?
-Oh! -[Nick] Oh God.
-[Audrey] We don't need to do that. -[Nick] That's cool.
translation.es: - No creo que sea necesario. - Genial…

translation.en: Who is it?
It's Saira. Let me in.
Uh, okay. One second.
-I need to hide. The closet! -No, no, no!
-[Nick] It's too dark. -Here. Come on.
-[Nick] She has all her stuff. -One second, Saira!
[Nick] Coming! Be right there!
Okay, gotta get to you!
-So sorry. One second. -Moving around some stuff for fun!
translation.es: - Perdón, enseguida. - Movimos cosas porque sí.

translation.en: -I know who you need to be looking at. -[Nick] Who?
translation.es: - Sé a quién deben investigar. - ¿A quién?

translation.en: -Claudette! -[Nick] Claudette?
[Saira] I told Vik she was bad news the minute I met her.
translation.es: Se lo advertí a Vik apenas la conocí.

translation.en: She's suspicious, narcissistic, manipulative, and looks cheap as well in that red dress--
translation.es: Es narcisista, manipuladora, y se ve muy vulgar con ese vestido…

translation.en: Excuse me! I'm so sorry to interrupt, but I feel like I'd be a rude hostess
translation.es: Perdón por interrumpir, pero sería una mala anfitriona

translation.en: if I didn't offer you a piece of this exquisite artisan cheese that's…
translation.es: si no te ofreciera un poco de este queso artesanal…

translation.en: Nick, where's this… Where's that cheese? The big--
-The cheese is gone. -Where is it?
I put it, uh, in my stomach.
You ate that entire block of cheese?
Trying to shame me. I don't know if that's gonna get the cheese back--
translation.es: No sé si hacerme pasar vergüenza te devolverá el queso…

translation.en: I'm sorry. I don't mean to be selfish--
Sorry. Hold on. You know what?
Let me give you a drink right now just to relax you a little bit.
translation.es: Te prepararé un trago, así te relajas.

translation.en: -Here. -I… I don't want that.
-No? Okay. -I'm okay.
-Oh shit. -[Saira] Who is it?
-[Audrey] Not sure. -You expecting someone?
It's like an after-party. People just show up.
translation.es: Es como un after, va llegando gente.

translation.en: Let's put you into the bedroom, just in case, 'cause I don't know.
translation.es: Ve a la habitación, por las dudas.

translation.en: -I'll hide there. -Don't hide in there! Why?
translation.es: - Me escondo… - ¡Ahí no! Ese lugar es muy obvio.

translation.en: That's an obvious spot.
-[Audrey] Is it hot in here? -I'm hot too.
-I'm coming! -[knocking continues]
What if that is the killer?
Don't you kinda want it to be the killer so they can kill us?
translation.es: ¿No prefieres que sea el asesino, así nos mata?

translation.en: I am sick of this shit.
-Baby, I do not feel very good. -[rock scraping]
translation.es: Amor, no me siento muy bien.

translation.en: What's doin'? Yeah?
Hey, great to see you.
What's going on? [chuckles lightly]
[Countess] I know who did it.
Who?
It was Francisco.
Francisco!
He has had over 85 paternity suits filed against him.
translation.es: Tiene más de 85 demandas por paternidad en su contra.

translation.en: We suspect he's been siphoning money out of the company in order to pay for all of these babies he made.
translation.es: Sospechamos que le roba a la empresa para pagar por todos sus bebés.

translation.en: That's a lie!
Not the part about the babies.
Yes, that's true. I've spread my seed far and wide,
translation.es: Es cierto que he esparcido mi semilla.

translation.en: but I have never stolen in my life.
-What are you doing here? -An excellent question.
-What are you all doing here? -Saira's here.
-Nobody move! -Oh my God!
I ain't moving.
It's mine. It's mine.
-I missed it. -[Nick] Missed the call?
I have a message.
[distorted voice] We have the Maharajah.
If you contact the authorities, he dies.
translation.es: Si llaman a la policía, morirá.

translation.en: We'll make our demands known to you at 7:00 a.m.
translation.es: Mañana a las 7:00 a. m. sabrán lo que pedimos.

translation.en: That voice is hysterical. You got to admit it.
So we should all stay here. Correct, Colonel?
Because one of us is definitely working with the kidnapper.
translation.es: Porque uno de nosotros está trabajando con el secuestrador.

translation.en: Yeah. Motives, opportunities.
Somebody here. My head is spinning a little bit.
Honey?
Babe, are you taking a nap? I'm tired, too, so let's, uh…
translation.es: ¿Dormirás una siesta? Yo también estoy cansado, mejor…

translation.en: Nobody leave here until we figure out who did what.
translation.es: Nadie se va hasta que sepamos todo.

translation.en: It's great to see everybody. -Thanks for coming over. Sorry, my bad. -[Francisco] Whoa!
translation.es: Un placer verlos a todos, gracias por venir.

translation.en: [yelps] Jesus! What?
Oh my God. Nick?
-[Nick] Yeah. -Nick?
[Nick] Yeah?
-[Audrey] Nick! -Uh-huh.
Nicky, honey. Get up. Get up! We got roofied.
-What happened? -[Audrey] Baby. Oh my God! We fell asleep!
-[Nick] Oh yeah? -Honey! [Nick] We're sleeping now.
I don't know what happened. Uh, I…
-Come on! Get up, Nick! -[Nick] Okay. Up. I'm up.
[Audrey] Who did this?
[Nick] What? Now they're just showing off.
-[Audrey] Hurry up! -[Nick] Okay, I'm coming, honey. So…
-[Audrey] Get up! -[Nick] I'm up!
-Calm down before you say anything. -Nobody drugs us and gets away with it!
translation.es: - Intenta calmarte. - Nadie nos droga sin pagarlo.

translation.en: -Maybe they didn't drug us. -It's illegal!
Maybe we just ate too much.
translation.es: Quizá fue por comer de más.

translation.en: -That's why we passed out. -Nick. Audrey. Just in time.
translation.es: Quizá fue por comer de más. Nick. Audrey. Justo a tiempo.

translation.en: -For what? -For what?
The real detectives have just arrived.
[Colonel] Connor Miller.
-[Audrey gasps] -Former MI6 hostage negotiator.
Oh my God. Specializes in high-profile cases.
translation.es: Dios mío. Se especializa en casos destacados.

translation.en: He got the President of Uruguay's son back from the cartel.
translation.es: Rescató al hijo del presidente uruguayo.

translation.en: -He wrote the book. He wrote the book. -On what?
How Rogaine doesn't work for everybody?
The book! Our course detective book!
[Miller] Greetings. I hear you need a case solved.
translation.es: Hola. Oí que necesitan resolver un caso.

translation.en: Colonel. Been a long time.
Francisco Perez.
Big fan.
-Oh. -Hey.
Mr. Miller, we're also very big fans. Um, we can bring you up to speed.
translation.es: Señor, nosotros lo admiramos. Los pondremos al tanto.

translation.en: So what we know already is that this is at least a two-person job.
translation.es: Sabemos que, al menos, fueron dos personas.

translation.en: I saw the first guy escape with Vik on a boat,
translation.es: Vi al primer tipo escapar con Vik en una lancha.

translation.en: leaving the second guy still on the island.
translation.es: El otro debió quedar en la isla.

translation.en: Also, just so you know, we were both drugged last night.
translation.es: Para que sepa, anoche nos drogaron.

translation.en: I don't know if we were drugged. We did have a few drinks--
translation.es: Eso no lo sé, bebimos unos tragos…

translation.en: -You must be the Spitzes. -Yes.
Yes, we are!
Your reputations precede you.
-There you go. -Why, thank you.
-That's nice to hear. -Uh, not in a positive way, I'm afraid.
translation.es: - Qué alegría. - Pero no en el buen sentido.

translation.en: Okay.
I understand the last time you were involved in something like this, everybody died?
translation.es: Entiendo que, en su última aventura de este estilo, todos murieron, ¿no?

translation.en: Well, that was not the Maharajah.
How's he doing now?
-[laughs] Okay. -Right.
The Colonel's still here, most of him, so there. That's good.
translation.es: El coronel sigue aquí, en su mayoría.

translation.en: Um, listen. Mr. Miller, I read your book, and--
translation.es: Señor Miller, leí su libro y…

translation.en: [Miller] Colonel, I wanna see all the security footage.
translation.es: Coronel, quiero los videos de seguridad.

translation.en: All the footage was wiped from the mainframe.
Yeah, 'cause it's an inside job.
Mademoiselle Joubert, we'll need your phone for a vocal analysis of the voice mail.
translation.es: Mademoiselle Joubert, necesitaré su teléfono para analizar el mensaje.

translation.en: Of course. Anything you need.
translation.es: - Por supuesto. - Son profesionales, sin duda.

translation.en: They're professional, no doubt. They were concise and brief on the phone.
translation.es: - Por supuesto. - Son profesionales, sin duda. Fueron concisos por teléfono.

translation.en: We also have reason to believe that the inside man was posing as an elephant handler.
translation.es: Y creemos que el cómplice se hizo pasar por cuidador de elefantes.

translation.en: You really wanna do suspects now, Mrs. Spitz?
-Sure. -[Miller] Fine.
How about this? Uh…
A husband and wife, one an NYPD almost-detective,
translation.es: Una pareja. Él, casi detective en Nueva York.

translation.en: the other a hairdresser taking online classes.
translation.es: Ella, peluquera que toma clases en línea.

translation.en: Together they run a private detective agency teetering on the edge of bankruptcy.
translation.es: Tienen una agencia de detectives al borde de la bancarrota.

translation.en: And if I were to hazard a guess, I'd say it's probably taking a toll on their marriage.
translation.es: Yo supondría que eso debe afectar al matrimonio.

translation.en: Desperate to give validity to their failing business,
they accept a last-minute invite from a billionaire to attend his wedding.
translation.es: aceptan la invitación repentina de un multimillonario.

translation.en: And so a plan is born.
Twenty-four hours after their arrival, there's a high-profile kidnapping,
translation.es: A 24 horas de su llegada, hay un secuestro de alto perfil,

translation.en: the sort that gets attention. A career maker.
translation.es: un caso que podría consagrar su carrera.

translation.en: How's my reasoning, fellow… detectives?
-Pretty excellent. None of it was true. -Gorgeous.
translation.es: - Excelente. - Genial. Falso, pero casi me convence con esa oratoria.

translation.en: I was starting to go with it 'cause of the way you phrase things.
translation.es: Falso, pero casi me convence con esa oratoria.

translation.en: -I almost believed him. -The accent helps.
Call trace is ready. Kidnappers should be calling in any minute.
translation.es: Están por llamar, estamos listos para rastrearlos.

translation.en: If you'll excuse me, I have a job to do.
-Okay, so listen. -[Audrey] Yes, honey.
We got good cheese. We got free iPhones. I'm happy with everything.
translation.es: Tenemos queso y los iPhone gratis. Me siento satisfecho.

translation.en: Where are you going? Did you hear what that guy just said about us?
translation.es: ¿Adónde vas? ¿No oíste lo que dijo de nosotros?

translation.en: -[Nick] Yeah. -None of that's true!
We need to show those people what Nick and Audrey Spitz are all about.
translation.es: Demostremos cuánto valen Nick y Audrey Spitz.

translation.en: The guy's good! I don't think he needs us.
translation.es: Él es bueno, no nos necesita.

translation.en: -Nick. Audrey. -[both] What?
The kidnapper says he'll only talk to the man he shot at.
translation.es: El secuestrador quiere hablar con el hombre al que le disparó.

translation.en: They need us. All right. They need us.
-Let's go! -Let's go!
-[machines beeping] -[Colonel] They're here.
-[Miller] He's calling back in a minute. -Okay.
You need to keep him calm, keep him talking.
-We need at least-- -Forty-five seconds.
-I know. It's not my first rodeo, pal. -You've done hostage negotiation?
translation.es: - Ya sé, no es mi primera vez. - ¿Ha negociado rehenes?

translation.en: I'm married to this lady. Everything's a negotiation. I got it.
translation.es: Estoy casado con ella. Vivo negociando. Sé lo que hago, gracias.

translation.en: Appreciate it.
So 45 seconds, and it starts… now.
Hi. Kidnapper, how are you?
[kidnapper] Is this the man who tried to stop me on my escape?
translation.es: ¿Habla el que intentó impedir mi escape?

translation.en: Yes, yes, yes, the man you shot at.
Luckily, I got out of the way. [chuckles]
translation.es: Por suerte, me tiré al piso.

translation.en: Tell me what we can do to get Vik back safely. That's all we really care about.
translation.es: ¿Qué quieres para devolvernos a Vik? No nos importa nada más.

translation.en: [kidnapper] For the return of the Maharajah, we require $50 million.
translation.es: Si quieren al maharajá, queremos 50 millones de dólares.

translation.en: Fifty putos millones?
Francisco, you think this is The Price Is Right, screaming out numbers?
translation.es: Francisco, no estás en la TV, no grites los números.

translation.en: Way too much money for just one guy.
Great. Just lost the trace. Thanks.
-It's my fault? This guy's yelling shit-- -Why are you yelling at me?
translation.es: - ¿Y es mi culpa? Si él… - ¿Por qué me gritas a mí?

translation.en: -You were directing at me-- -I yelled at that guy!
translation.es: - Me miraste a mí. - ¡No, a él!

Excuse me! At least we are married.

translation.en: Can we remain calm?
-I'm sorry. Of course. -We're calm.
He wants the money. He's gonna call back.
-[Audrey] Relax. -[Nick] Yup.
-[phone ringing] -[Nick] Here we go. Okay.
-[Miller] Here we go. -Got this!
Forty-five seconds starts again now.
Sorry about that, man. A lot of anxious people here.

translation.en: One drunk guy. We all got that friend.
[kidnapper] The price just went up to 60.
They say, "Great. No problem."
[kidnapper] You will bring $60 million in untraceable bearer bonds

translation.en: and wait with this phone for further instructions.

But we are going to need unequivocal evidence that the hostage is still alive.

translation.en: -Cool. -Thank you very much.
[kidnapper] Arc de Triomphe, 8:00 p.m., or the Maharajah dies.

translation.en: The voice jumbling thing you got on your… It's hard to understand you.

translation.en: -The location, yes. -Can you do that again? Where is it?
-[kidnapper] Arc de Triomphe. -[Nick] This is what you sound like…

translation.en: -[Nick] That's what we hear. -[kidnapper] Arc de Triomphe!
Okay, so Arctic Tree Hump.

translation.en: Got it. You said that, right? [kidnapper] The price just went up to 70 now!
[kidnapper] Seventy million, or the Maharajah dies a painful death.

-[kidnapper] Oh my God! -[disconnects]
You just cost us 20 extra million, you doofus!
I don't want these buffoons involved.

-We did? -Aha!
-See? Team Buffoon wins again! -Thank you!

Can we just… You know what? After we get Vik back,
we could go and renew our vows at Love Locks Bridge.

-[Miller] They're compromised. -Oh, okay.

-I told you, I was on the force. What? -Um…
[hesitates] I just think maybe I should handle it.
-You should handle it? -Just--
-Why would that-- -Your aim is--
My aim? My aim is fine.

translation.en: That's like me saying you wear Spanx in front of a supermodel.

translation.en: So, uh, I'll take the gun 'cause I'm very good with a gun.
translation.es: Yo llevaré el arma, porque las manejo muy bien.

translation.en: They used to call me "Nicky Guns" on the force. That was my nickname.
translation.es: En la policía, me decían "Nicky Pistolas".

translation.en: Gang members used to ask me for advice on the weekends 'cause I shot so well.

You take the gun.
I'll take the gun. I got the phone, and you got the money.

translation.en: from Chapter 12 of my book.
Can you do that? Remember what they are?
Number one. Um, follow all reasonable instructions.

Do not hand off the ransom until you see the kidnappee.

translation.en: [Miller] Exactly.
And number three. Do not go to a secondary location with them.

translation.en: Perfect. You'll be fine. Off you go.
-Okay. -"Nicky Guns" style. Let's go!
-Cool. -I'm gonna hand you this.

You gotta tell me who didn't call me that. Everybody called me that.

translation.en: This is the heaviest goddamn case of money I've ever felt.

I'm gonna go two hands. Does that look weird?
-[Audrey] Your hands are cute. -[Nick] "Cute"? What does that mean?
-You have cute hands. -Your family has orangutan ha--

[Audrey] I never said dainty hands.
I said it's weird to high-five you 'cause your hands are little.

Initiate the trace.

Okay. Okay. I'm coming.

We gotta go to the van.

Oh shit.
Get in the van.

Get in the van.

For kidnapping the Maharajah, murdering his bodyguard,

translation.en: And not just 'cause the last one got smoked.
translation.es: Y no solo porque mataron al otro.

translation.en: That Kwanzaa bonus better be off the hook this year.
translation.es: El próximo bono de Kwanzaa tendrá que ser generoso.

translation.en: Hey, it's bionic arm time, bitch! Yeah?
translation.es: Se viene el brazo biónico, vieja, ¿sí?

translation.en: -Yeah? -Yeah!
[Susan] You're okay.
-How are you feeling, young man? -How are you doing?
-I'm okay. -Laurent is a special man. Aren't you?
translation.es: - Estoy bien. - Laurent es muy especial. ¿No?

translation.en: We're gonna go to dinner once you get out of the hospital.
translation.es: Iremos a cenar cuando salgas del hospital.

translation.en: Paris weaves its spell once again.
translation.es: La magia de París no falla.

translation.en: Feel better.
-All right. -[Vik] Should we tell them?
-Yes! [laughs] -Okay, guys. We decided to elope.
translation.es: ¿Les decimos? Sí. Chicos, decidimos casarnos en soledad.

translation.en: -That is the smart choice, always. -That's amazing.
Good for you guys.
Yeah, no family, but, um, I owe you guys my life.
translation.es: Sin familiares. Pero a ustedes les debo la vida.

translation.en: Oh, we're just happy you're both okay.
And really, honestly, thank you for giving us an adventure…
translation.es: En serio, gracias por darnos una aventura…

translation.en: Yes.
…we are never going to forget.
-I guess we're even then. Peace out. -Peace out!
translation.es: - Sí. - Quedamos a mano. Adiós. Adiós.

translation.en: -Bye-bye. -Au revoir!
Sorry about your sister being a psycho, by the way.
translation.es: Lamento que tu hermana esté demente.

translation.en: Ah, don't worry about it. She's a real piece of shit.
-Yes, she was. -[both] Yeah.
-[Nick] Okay. -Honey, I'm really ready to go home.
translation.es: - Bien. - Me quiero ir a casa.

translation.en: -Yes, I am too. -I'm really ready.
translation.es: - Sí, yo también. - Es lo que quiero.

translation.en: We have to do one thing first.
translation.es: Pero antes, nos queda una cosa.

translation.en: -Trust me. Trust me. All right? -What? Okay. Okay. Okay.
-[Nick] Check on the Colonel. You okay? -[Audrey] Colonel!
You're not losing this arm?
[Nick] Click it. Click it. We did it.
Now we are forever locked up together for the rest of our lives.
translation.es: Ahora estamos condenados a pasar la vida juntos.

translation.en: I'd never wanna be locked up with anybody else.
translation.es: No querría estar condenada con nadie más.

translation.en: Me neither, sweetheart. You are--
-[man] The Shitz! -What?
[chuckles] Nick and Audrey Shitz!
-The helicopter guy? What the-- -What are you doing here?
Take it. Take the phone!
Hello?
[Vik] Of course we're not even. Take my helicopter!
translation.es: No estamos a mano. ¡Tomen mi helicóptero!

translation.en: Go anywhere! Have a honeymoon you deserve! And a little cash!
translation.es: Disfruten la luna de miel que merecen. ¡Y este dinero es suyo!

translation.en: -What? -Cash? A bag of--
-Are you for real? -[Nick laughs]
-Oh my gosh. Look! Oh my-- -Well, yeah.
translation.es: ¿Es de verdad? Cielos, mira… Sí, parece suficiente, gracias.

translation.en: That seems to be enough money. Thank you.
[Vik] Just ten million! Don't spend it all in one place!
But if you do spend it all, just sell the briefcase.
translation.es: Si lo gastan todo, vendan el bolso.

translation.en: It's worth three million!
-It's dinosaur leather! -My God!
Dinosaur? We can't take this! Come on!
You know what? We will take this. Thank you.
[Vik] Now you two keep busting nuts! Maharajah out!
What's the first thing you wanna do? -I wanna kiss you! -Ah!
translation.es: - ¿Qué es lo primero que quieres hacer? - Besarte.

translation.en: I can't believe this!
-My baby. -My darling.
The honeymoon we always deserved.
translation.es: La luna de miel que merecíamos.

translation.en: -Exactly. -Finally.
Can you believe how lucky we are?
[American accent] You liking those drinks?
-What-- -Are you shitz-ing us right now?
Hand me the bag.
What? The, uh--
-Bag. Hand me the bag. -You want this?
-That's not a problem. -Give him the bag.
[Nick] What happened to the accent?
It's back in Jersey.
Let's just have a civilized conversation.
[pilot] See you never, Shitzes!
-Oh my God! Where did he-- -Oh my God! Oh-- Oh my--
